description: React component for user registration page, including form handling, validation with Yup, interaction with Supabase for user sign-up and profile creation.

methods.name: RegisterPage()
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders registration form, manages form state, validation, and user registration flow.

methods.name: ensureProfile
methods.description: Async function to check existing user profile in database and create one with role 'student' if missing.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs user sign-up via signUp method, creates user profile, and navigates to login page.
